sentence.text: An excited horse that is enjoying a gallop one minute , may suddenly become fearful and bolt the next .
He gave a shriek that should have woken the village ghosts , and bolted down the road , shivering puddles into glittering clouds around him .
His brutish , stupid face was blotchy with fear now and his eyes were bolting from his head .
She finally found her voice , screaming as she bolted from the hideous life-form that was shaping even as she watched into the form , the outward appearance of a dead human .
Ana turned and bolted from the room .
I only just managed to get it down before bolting from the tent just in time to get rid of the contents of my stomach .
We could never do that with Argentine ponies : they just bolted in terror .
She bolted into a deep brake of ferns and , bending low , crept away and then sank down and crouched motionless , hoping the two men would n't find her .
Hearing these words and seeing the speaker ride boldly toward him , the tiger was so alarmed that he turned tail and bolted into the forest .
Father-of-two Mr Davies , 38 , from Gwent , saw his marriage crumble and businesses crash after the horse bolted into his Mercedes car .
The creature grunted , and with one swipe of a claw gouged a wound in the flank of Twoflower 's horse , which screamed and bolted into the trees at the roadside .
The Danakil guide we had acquired at Bilen had tried to bolt on the march , so I detailed two soldiers to guard him till dawn .
There were men running with torches but the horse bolted past them .
She bolted through the open door , and all the time dreaded the touch of his hand on her shoulder , stopping her .
He sounded so disgusted that she seized her case and bolted through the door he indicated .
One of DEC 's principal Alpha RISC architects , Richard Witek , has reportedly bolted to Apple Computer Inc .
As the frightened boy bolted to Gooseneck 's side , there was a scream from Fishbane 's corner where an unwary Pole had reaped the consequences of turning her back to view the drama .
Though , since her denial was hardly any excuse for the way she had been trying to bolt to her room , she felt honour-bound to give him just as straightforward an explanation .
Yesterday evening , just before she 'd bolted to the safety of her bedroom , he really had seemed different , more … relaxed , human .
When Grant 's shout had spurred him into action , Jim Miller had seized Louise 's hand and pulled her after him , as he bolted to safety among the trees .
When a fox bolted towards the hedgerow , the dogs barked furiously .
With extraordinary strength he struggled to his feet , knocked Lucy 's hands away , kicked her legs , heaved her to one side and bolted for the open air .
The aim was to save animals who bolted during the blitz -- it promised to return any lost animal to its owner .
When the London doctors finally granted him his freedom , he bolted like a child let out of school .

Martha bolted out of the door and crashed through the hedge into Mada Joyce 's yard , expecting to hear her grandmother 's shout of rage behind her and all the more fearful when only silence pursued her .
Hitch understood and bolted for the door , picking the receiver up with infinite care so that he too could hear the voice on the other end of the line .
` Sure , sure , " Ari said , and bolted for the door .
His imagination bolted ahead like a runaway horse , only to be reined firmly in and brought to a halt .
The following year he chalked up his fifth win , even though his horse broke a bridle strap and bolted just before the start .
He bolts off , down the wet lawn , without a backward glance .
A low hissing filled the room as she bolted out and slammed the door .
` I wo n't bother you now , " he said , and bolted out .
He bolted back into the van and emerged clutching a grey , much-folded piece of paper .
The other three turned and bolted off down the stairs .
` You bolted off into the forest , " said Tommy , his eyes never leaving Trentham .
He knew which way his rat had bolted .
The scientists looked at each other in astonishment , and in that instant , Benny bolted .
He would not listen when she tried to stop him , and when she made to mount again he took hold of her , and in the struggle the mare broke free and bolted .
The PAC uncovered many scandals , but as its investigations were post-mortems it was accused of ` only shutting the stable door after the horse had bolted " ( see Pollitt 1977 ) .
